meanings.sent1: The quiet, monastic life of the monks was dedicated to prayer and meditation.
meanings.sent2: The monastery was a peaceful, monastic retreat nestled in the mountains.
meanings.sent3: The monastic monks enjoyed their simple life away from the hustle and bustle of the city.
meanings.sent4: Her room was so tidy and organized, it had a monastic feel to it.
meanings.sent5: The monastic garden was a serene oasis of tranquility.

meanings.definition: A person who is a member of a religious community living under vows of poverty, chastity, and obedience.
meanings.sent1: The young man decided to become a monastic and dedicate his life to serving others.
meanings.sent2: The monastic spent hours in prayer and contemplation every day.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous children in the village liked to play pranks on the monastic for fun.
meanings.sent4: She admired the monastic's unwavering commitment to their faith and beliefs.
meanings.sent5: The monastic's selfless acts of kindness touched the hearts of many in the community.
